availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Virginia. Married Sarah P. Howorth on November 21, 1822. Worked as the judge of the Simpson Circuit Court.

Spouse: Sarah P. Graham (Howorth)
Children: Sarah Graham, H A Graham, Margaret Graham

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Simpson County, Franklin, District 2, page 4.
U.S. Find a Grave Index, 1600-Present, "Judge Asher W Graham," https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=116840662&ref=acom accessed 05/17/2017.

Kentucky Compiled Marriages, Warren County, 1822, http://search.ancestry.com/cgi-bin/sse.dll?indiv=1&db=eamky&h=66938&tid=&pid=&usePUB=true&phsrc=SVs1667&phstart=successSource&usePUBJs=true&rhSource=60525 accessed 05/17/2017.
